participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and nurturing, always looking forward to new challenges.
participant_1.background: i work at a school. i just moved into my first home. i'm expecting triplets in three months. a already have a step children.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Sarcastic yet insightful, with a flair for the dramatic.
participant_2.background: i have two grown children who never visit. i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
